Text:
If Space Shuttle X was released in 2007, it has likely been uploaded at TPB several times in the past 5 years.

how to delete it, the parasite that likes slow downloads?

If you actually want to delete a torrent, you must go here, register on the forums and make a post: 
https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=99094
To be fair, it is forbidden to duplicate your own torrents and it is discouraged and frowned upon to duplicate the torrents of others; for what should be obvious reasons. My advice would be to leave this active and adjust future activity, but do as you please. If you ask, it WILL be deleted...and in terms of speed, the download is controlled by the size, number and speed of those in the seed swarm. After the initial seeding, it is absurd to compare torrents in terms of speed, they can only be compared by seed/leech values.
